project_plan.name: Command-Line Python Tool for Temperature Conversion
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool in Python to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin based on user input.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion logic for Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic for Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion logic for Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Implement user input handling for temperature and desired output unit
Write tests for the conversion functions
Execute tests on all implemented conversion features to ensure they function correctly
